00027 namespace boost {
00028 namespace xint {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00031 BOOST_XINT_INLINE bool getbit(const data_t n, size_t bit_index) {
00032     size_t index = bit_index / bits_per_digit;
00033     if (index < n.length) {
00034         digit_t mask=(digit_t(1) << (bit_index % bits_per_digit));
00035         return ((n[index] & mask) != 0);
00036     } else return false;
00037 }
00038 
00039 BOOST_XINT_INLINE void setbit(data_t& n, size_t bit_index) {
00040     if (n.is_fixed_length() && bit_index >= (n.max_length() * bits_per_digit))
00041         return;
00042 
00043     size_t index = (bit_index / bits_per_digit);
00044     digit_t mask = (digit_t(1) << (bit_index % bits_per_digit));
00045 
00046     n.beginmod(index + 1, true);
00047     n.digits()[index] |= mask;
00048     if (n.length < index + 1) n.length = index + 1;
00049     n.endmod();
00050 }
00051 
00052 BOOST_XINT_INLINE void clearbit(data_t& n, size_t bit_index) {
00053     size_t index = (bit_index / bits_per_digit);
00054     if (index >= n.length) return; // Bit can't be set, no need to clear it.
00055     digit_t mask = (digit_t(1) << (bit_index % bits_per_digit));
00056 
00057     n.beginmod();
00058     n.digits()[index] &= ~mask;
00059     n.endmod();
00060 }
00061 
00062 BOOST_XINT_INLINE size_t lowestbit(const data_t n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00063     if (n.is_zero()) return valueIfZero;
00064 
00065     const digit_t *d = n.digits(), *p = d, *pe = p + n.length;
00066     while (p != pe && *p == 0) ++p;
00067     size_t r = (bits_per_digit * (p - d));
00068 
00069     digit_t digit = *p;
00070     while ((digit & 0x01)==0) { digit >>= 1; ++r; }
00071 
00072     return r;
00073 }
00074 
00075 BOOST_XINT_INLINE size_t highestbit(const data_t n, size_t valueIfZero) {
00076     if (n.is_zero()) return valueIfZero;
00077     return ((n.length - 1) * bits_per_digit) + log2(n[n.length - 1]);
00078 }
00079 
00080 } // namespace detail
00081 } // namespace xint
00082 } // namespace boost
